summary: Quick and easy mod, gives you a silver ring that makes sneaking easy and you virtually undetectable.
descriptionHtml:
Quick and easy mod, gives you a silver ring that makes sneaking easy and you virtually undetectable.

This is my first attempt at a mod so please any feedback or suggestions are most wanted.

I am looking to enter the ring into another place in the world for those that would like to loot it from a chest or buy it from a merchant, any suggestions on where to place it would be greatly appreciated.

UPDATED: The ring can now be found in the Riverwood Trader for sale from The merchant there, ( at a reasonable price for the power of the ring) and also loot-able from the satchel in the torture room of Helgen Keep

How to get in game using console command:- type into console player.additem XX000d63 1 (xx is a unique value assigned to the item that varies per system, please use the extra details below to add the item manually) if you find that this does not work then please type help shadows into console and look for the item id for the ring of shadows and substitute with the one above.

This mod will modify the base sneak attribute providing 99999% fortification.

As far as I know this is compatible with all mods and DLC for Skyrim.


INSTALLATION

extract the file into your Data folder of your Skyrim installation.

UNINSTALL

Delete the .esp file from your Data Folder.
author: shaggy125
